about.introText: Whether you are a programmer or not, you are in the right place!
about.whatIsQuimploText: Quimplo is more than just a template marketplace. Our mission is to empower creators and developers by providing an environment where you can share your creations and find the tools you need to take your projects to the next level.
about.forProgrammersText: For programmers, Quimplo offers a wide range of programming technologies. Whether you're an experienced developer or just starting out, we have the resources you need to create amazing and functional templates. Our marketplace allows you to sell your templates directly to a global community of users, increasing your visibility and reach.
about.forNonProgrammersText: For those who are not programmers, Quimplo is still the ideal platform. We offer easy-to-use templates that can be customized without any programming knowledge. With our intuitive interface, anyone can create stunning and professional websites with just a few clicks.
about.diversityOfTechnologies: Diversity of Technologies: We offer support for various programming technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, Vue.js, and much more.
about.easeOfUse: Ease of Use: Our platform is designed to be user-friendly, allowing anyone, regardless of their technical experience, to create and sell templates.
about.globalCommunity: Global Community: Join a community of creators and developers from around the world. Share your ideas, collaborate on projects, and find inspiration.
about.supportAndResources: Support and Resources: We provide tutorials, guides, and technical support to help you at every stage of your project.
about.joinQuimploText: If you are ready to turn your ideas into reality, Quimplo is the place for you. Explore our platform, discover new possibilities, and start creating and selling your templates right now!

homeHero.title: Your template on Quimplo, success!
homeHero.description: Launch your template on Quimplo with ease to attract more visitors and boost your sales. You don't even need an account!

homeFeatures.sectionSubtitle: It's easy to publish on Quimplo!

features.title: Fill out the form
features.description: Complete all the necessary information and submit your template for review.

features.title: Wait for review
features.description: Once submitted, your template will be reviewed. You can also opt for a highlight to appear at the top.

features.title: Done!
features.description: Your template is being set up and will be live soon!

homeLogos.sectionTitle: Showcase your templates across various technologies
homeLogos.sectionSubtitle: You can have it in every template

homeNewsletter.titlePart1: Subscribe to the Quimplo events newsletter to be the first to know about new templates

homeFAQs.sectionSubtitle: If you missed something, we've answered some frequently asked questions.

faqs.question: How can Quimplo help me sell my template?
faqs.answer: Quimplo offers a platform where you can list and showcase your template, increasing its visibility to potential buyers and streamlining the selling process.

faqs.question: What fees are associated with selling on Quimplo?
faqs.answer: Quimplo charges a small commission on each sale, which helps maintain the platform and promote your listings to a broader audience.

faqs.question: What advantages does Quimplo offer for selling my template?
faqs.answer: By listing your template on Quimplo, you gain access to a marketplace designed to connect you with buyers, simplifying the sales process and increasing your template's exposure.

faqs.question: Are there any costs involved in using Quimplo?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quimplo applies a modest fee on each transaction. This fee ensures the platform's maintenance and helps fund the promotion of your template.

faqs.question: Can Quimplo help me reach more buyers?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Quimplo's platform is designed to give your template maximum exposure, connecting you with a wider audience of potential buyers.

faqs.question: Is there a fee to list a template on Quimplo?
faqs.answer: Quimplo does not charge a fee to list your template. Instead, a small fee is taken from successful sales to support the platform's operations and marketing efforts.

faqs.question: How does Quimplo enhance my template's visibility?
faqs.answer: Quimplo uses targeted marketing and a user-friendly interface to highlight your template, attracting more interest from potential buyers.

faqs.question: What support does Quimplo offer during the selling process?
faqs.answer: Quimplo provides tools and resources to help you create an attractive listing, and our support team is available to assist with any questions you may have.

header.title: Find the perfect template for you!
header.subTitle: Explore our collection of templates or, if you prefer,

faqs.title: COMMON QUESTIONS ABOUT TEMPLATES
faqs.subtitle: Clear your doubts about the template

questions.question: What is this template?
questions.answer: This template is a platform where you can view and purchase templates created with different tools.

questions.question: How can I buy a template?
questions.answer: To buy a template, click on the 'Buy this template' button, and you will be redirected to the purchase page.

questions.question: What tools are used?
questions.answer: The templates available here are made with tools like Drupal, Elementor, Framer, Ghost, HTML/CSS/JS, Next.js, React, Webflow, Wix, and WordPress.

toolDescriptions.drupal: Drupal is a free and open-source web content management system, written in PHP and distributed under the GNU General Public License.
toolDescriptions.elementor: Elementor is a popular page builder plugin for WordPress that allows users to create custom layouts without coding.
toolDescriptions.framer: Framer is a design tool for creating interactive prototypes and animations for websites and apps.
toolDescriptions.ghost: Ghost is a powerful open-source publishing platform focused on professional publishing and blogs.
toolDescriptions.html-css-js: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are the fundamental technologies for building and designing websites and web applications.
toolDescriptions.html: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard language for creating web pages and applications.
toolDescriptions.css: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.
toolDescriptions.js: JavaScript is a programming language that enables the creation of dynamic and interactive web content.
toolDescriptions.next: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation for optimized web applications.
toolDescriptions.react: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, maintained by Facebook and a community of developers and companies.
toolDescriptions.webflow: Webflow is a web design tool, CMS, and hosting platform in one, allowing users to design, build, and launch responsive websites visually.
toolDescriptions.wix: Wix is a cloud-based web development platform that allows users to create HTML5 websites using drag-and-drop tools.
toolDescriptions.wordpress: WordPress is an open-source content management system (CMS) used to build and manage websites, known for its flexibility and ease of use.

header.title: Ready to publish your template?
header.description: Your template needs to be of high quality and undergo a rigorous verification process. This process may take 1 to 2 weeks, but you can shorten it by subscribing to Quimplo Premium.

1.title: Your Information
1.description: Provide your name, email, profile link, template name, and description. This helps users understand what your site is about.

2.title: Detailed Description
2.description: Provide a detailed description of your site. Include information such as the purpose of the site, the target audience, key features, and any other relevant details. The more comprehensive the description, the better users will understand the value of your site.

3.title: Category
3.description: Choose the category that best fits your site. This helps organize and find your site.

4.title: Tool
4.description: Select the tool you used to create your site.

5.title: Image
5.description: Add a representative image of your site.

6.title: Features
6.description: Select the features your site offers, such as responsiveness, SEO optimization, etc.

7.title: Publish Your Site
7.description: To finish, please accept the terms and conditions. Your site will be reviewed and will be available to the public later.

successModal.title: Form submitted successfully!
successModal.description: Please note that it may take 1 to 2 weeks for us to review your submission.

yourInfoStep.profileLinkInfo: Provide a link to your professional profile.
yourInfoStep.contactLinkInfo: Provide a link for potential buyers to contact you.
yourInfoStep.templateNameInfo: Enter the name of your template.
yourInfoStep.templateDescriptionInfo: Describe your template in detail (minimum 30 characters).
yourInfoStep.livePreviewInfo: Provide a link to a live preview of your template.
yourInfoStep.buyLinkInfo: Provide a link where your template can be purchased.

yourInfoStep.validProfileLink: Please enter a valid profile link.
yourInfoStep.descriptionLength: Description must be at least 30 characters.
yourInfoStep.validLivePreview: Please enter a valid live preview link.
yourInfoStep.validBuyLink: Please enter a valid purchase link.
yourInfoStep.validContactLink: Please enter a valid contact link.
yourInfoStep.detailDescription: Write a more detailed description regarding features and overview.

imageStep.dragAndDropOrChoose: Drag and Drop or Choose a Local File

agree.confirmText: I confirm that the template complies with the
agree.quickText1: Please carefully review all information before submitting the form. The review process may take some time, and any errors or missing information can delay the approval of your template. To speed up the process, you can opt for our Fast Review service, ensuring a quicker review.
agree.quickText2: By opting for the Fast Review service, your form will be reviewed with priority, saving time and speeding up the approval process of your site.

cookies.cookieNoticeMessage: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
cookies.introText: Welcome to Quimplo's Cookies Policy page! Here, we explain how we use cookies and similar technologies to provide the best possible experience on our site.
cookies.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help remember your preferences and activities, making navigation easier and improving user experience.
cookies.howWeUseCookiesTitle: How do we use cookies at Quimplo?
cookies.howWeUseCookiesText: At Quimplo, we use cookies for various purposes, including:
cookies.necessaryCookies: Necessary Cookies: These cookies are essential for the website to function correctly. Without them, some functionalities may not be available.
cookies.performanceCookies: Performance Cookies: These cookies collect information about how visitors use the site, helping us improve performance and user experience.
cookies.functionalityCookies: Functionality Cookies: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices (such as your username, language, or region) to provide a more personalized experience.
cookies.managingCookiesText: You can manage and/or delete cookies as you prefer. Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your browsing experience on Quimplo.
cookies.moreInfoText: If you have any questions or need more information about our cookie policy, please contact us through our support.
